feed.title: ChangeDetection Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.46.03 Minor bugfix update
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Handle zero-byte responses with "Empty pages are a change" option, the same as when the HTML doesnt render any useful text by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2530
  • Add encoding for scraper script reader by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2574
  • Pass headers to Browser Steps by @mikesplain in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2551
  • Small price fix scraper by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2575
  • Watch 'get last snapshot' should give last, not first snapshot by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2576

New Contributors

  • @mikesplain made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.46.02...0.46.03

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.46.04 - Minor updates
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adding extra ML element training data by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2582
  • Re #1708 unpin jsonschema by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2583
  • Catch errors when parsing documents for restock/price check by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2602
  • Fixing restock test refactor by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2603

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.46.03...0.46.04

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.47.01 Release for pypi/pip installs
entry.content:
Left out the apprise_plugin for Apprise integration - Fixed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.47.00...0.47.01

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.47.02 Minor UI fix
New release for ChangeDetection: 0.47.03
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove same checksum skip by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2700
  • UI fix for tabs behind menu/header

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.47.01...0.47.03
